example.code:
$newRuleCondition = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.RuleCondition
$newPathPattern = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.PathPatternConditionConfig $newPathPattern.Values = '/login1','/login2','/login3'
$newRuleCondition.PathPatternConfig = $newPathPattern $newRuleCondition.Field = 'path-pattern'
Edit-ELB2Rule -RuleArn 'arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:listener-rule/app/test-alb/3651b4394dd9a24f/3873f123b98f7618/d11e4eed207fe5aa' -Condition $newRuleCondition -Region us-east-1
Actions : {Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.Action} Conditions : {Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.RuleCondition} IsDefault : False Priority : 1 RuleArn : arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:listener-rule/app/test-alb/3651b4394dd9a24f/3873f123b98f7618/d11e4eed207fe5aa
example.description: This example modifes the specified Listener rule configurations.
